Dear player,

You can change the language settings according to the following steps:

1. Click the portrait icon in the lower right corner of the application interface.
2. Select the language options in the menu.
3. After selecting the language you want, click to confirm to save your settings.

If you encounter any problems during the operation, please contact our customer service team at any time, and we will help you with all your help.

Dear player,

If you need to update the contact information, you can follow the steps below:

1. Click the portrait icon in the lower right corner of the application interface.
2. Select the update phone number option in the menu.
3. After entering your new phone number, click Send TAC.
4. After receiving the TAC verification code, enter the number and click Submit to complete the update.

If you encounter any problems in this process, please contact our customer service team at any time, and we will be willing to help you.
